reviews.title: Gulliver's travels
reviews.content: Sunshine radiates past corners and mermaids swim off the page, while rainbow wisps stream from Mary’s paintbrush and trail after her fingers…. reviews.title: Gulliver's travels
reviews.content: “Barrager’s digital illustrations employ a kaleidoscopic, Fauvist palette and intense patterns in a retro aesthetic that reflects the time of Disney’s golden age. Guglielmo and Tourville’s text uses deliciously precise color names…. This is a love letter to the color wheel and a prismatic snapshot of a

reviews.title: Gulliver's travels
reviews.content: “Barrager’s hues…are energetic…. A bright homage to Blair’s bold work.”
